page.title: 15DARTMOUTH FUTURE PROJECTS(2)
page.content:
{ Dartmouth's Redundant Buildings.
Some future projects in Dartmouth involve using some of its buildings which are presently redundant.These include the{Methodist Church overlooking the Market Square which may well be converted into an art and craft centre, and the old{Fire Station next to the Flavel Hall will probably become a sail loft. Much{debate}often occurs in the local newspapers when buildings become available. The Fire Station was discussed as a possible opportunity to resite the local library, or as a base for a playgroup or similar{community enterprise.
